file_content.text: No! I won't let the darkness take me! Go away or I'll open the air lock! I'd rather die than be taken!
You don't want to release the air lock. You want to come to me.
[Force Persuade] Come here.
I want to come to you. I won't release the air lock.
Take my lightsaber. Please, don't let me hurt anyone else.
Please, Laranna. I can shield you from the darkness.
I am not your enemy.
Lies! Lord Vivicar warned me about your lies!
The Jedi just betray and kill each other, he said. He's going to make me his apprentice!
Think on what the Jedi teach, Laranna.
No. That's not the Jedi way.
The code. There... is no emotion, there is peace... you're right. What have I done?
Master Fain is waiting for you to come home, Laranna. Are you going to let him down?
Think of your father.
My father? Wait, you're... you're the Jedi who saved him from his illness?
I was going to visit him--before the ambush.
And what about the innocents you've killed? What about the crew?
You're the one killing people.
But the crew are... they... no. What have I done?
I was going to visit my father--then there was the ambush.
And the healer came. Lord Vivicar. No! No! The darkness is coming! I can't stop it!
Don't worry, Laranna. Everything's going to be alright.
It's okay. [Shield her]
Hold still. [Shield her]
What--what did you do? You look so weak.
But Lord Vivicar's voice is gone, the voice in my head. How did you do it?
A shielding ritual that blocks Vivicar's influence. The same ritual that saved your father.
It's a special technique.
It's a shielding ritual that blocks you from Vivicar's influence.
It's a special technique.
I won't discuss it.
I won't question you. It's like I went from night into day.
It was nothing special.
But it's taken a lot out of you. And the difference for me, it's like night and day.
I just can't believe I let that monster... make me do those terrible things.
I'm sorry. I--I'm going to lock myself in the brig until we reach a port. I don't trust myself.
I can't allow you to live any longer.
Then die.
Aaagh!
He said you killed my father on Nar Shaddaa. You won't kill me too!
You'll have to come out sooner or later, and when you do, I'll be waiting.
You can't stay there forever.
No! No! I won't let you, I won't let it happen.
The darkness will never take m--uggggrgl!
Oh! What have we here? A little engineer poking around where he shouldn't.
I wonder what this button does? Oh! Was that the air lock? Silly me. Bye-bye, little engineer.
You're Duras Fain's daughter Laranna?
Laranna Fain?
Laranna Fain? Why yes, that's me! How did you guess?
Laranna, you're ill, you need help.
Let me help you.
But I've never felt better in my whole life!
It's time you answered for your crimes, Laranna Fain.
Stand down, murderer.
My crimes? Oh, you're so silly.
The ship is nearly under my control. Isn't it wonderful? The darkness is coming, but it won't take me!
Lord Vivicar has taken control of your mind. You must resist.
Fight this madness.
Lord Vivicar? The nice man who healed me? He warned me about you.
We can stop the darkness together. Just listen to me first.
Perhaps I could help you?
I won't be fooled. You belong to the darkness. Lord Vivicar explained everything when he healed me.
You've fallen to the dark side, Laranna. You must die.
You deserve to be killed.
You know, Lord Vivicar warned me about you when he healed me.
He said you've been killing his apprentices, interfering in his mission to stop the darkness.
But you're not going to kill me, Jedi. I won't let you.
